categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Core Sets

nodes.text: The Force Awakens Core Set is an updated 2-player starter set for the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game, a tactical ship-to-ship combat game released by Fantasy Flight Games. It features three fully assembled and painted starships—one T-70 X-wing starfighter and two First Order TIE fighter. It was released on September 4, 2015.
Although it is a variant of the X-Wing: Core Set, it is neither a reboot of the Core Set itself nor does it replace it.

Take command of a Resistance X-wing or two First Order TIE fighters with The Force Awakens™ Core Set for the X-Wing™ Miniatures Game! In this two-player game of dramatic, high-speed dogfights, you and your opponent battle head-to-head for the fate of the galaxy. Secretly plot your maneuvers, fly at your enemies, take aim, and fire. It takes just minutes to learn the rules, but the game's expansions and rules for squad building ensure there's plenty of Star Wars action that you can explore and enjoy for years to come!
The Force Awakens Core Set contains three miniatures, plus maneuver dials and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
